attributes.action: Make deportation mandatory for all convicted criminals not born in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are far too many cases of immigrants & assylum seekers who having been convicted of crimes are allowed to remain in the UK.
If they abuse our hospitality in any way they should be automatically deported after completing their sentence, even if their country is deemed unsafe.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
